channel.title: store on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in store on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-07
item.description: Apple developing new ‘Apple Studio Display’ with 7K resolution (2 minute read) Apple is reportedly developing an Apple Studio Display with 7K resolution.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-29
item.description: Here’s everything Amazon just announced: A home robot named Astro, a fitness band and more (6 minute read) Amazon just announced a bunch of new gadgets ahead of the busy holiday shopping season.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-01
item.description: South Korea law forces Google and Apple to open up app store payments (3 minute read) Apple and Google are battling lawsuits and regulators around the world due to their app store rules.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-05
item.description: TikTok confirms pilot test of TikTok Stories is now underway (3 minute read) TikTok is piloting a new feature called TikTok Stories.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-06
item.description: Andy Jassy officially takes over as Amazon CEO from Jeff Bezos (3 minute read) Jeff Bezos has stepped down as CEO of Amazon and is now the Executive Chair.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-18
item.description: Here’s what’s inside Google’s first-ever retail store (3 minute read) Google has opened its first-ever permanent retail location in New York City.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-19
item.description: Apple will reduce App Store cut to 15 percent for most developers starting January 1st (5 minute read) Apple will reduce its App Store commission rate to 15 percent for developers who earn less than $1 million in annual sales per year from all of their apps.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-28
item.description: TikTok CEO Kevin Mayer to leave the company (4 minute read) TikTok CEO Kevin Mayer has resigned from the company just months after his appointment.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-25
item.description: Apple reportedly acquires VR startup ‘Spaces’ (1 minute read) Spaces is a startup with a team that specializes in virtual reality technologies.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-14
item.description: Apple just kicked Fortnite off the App Store (7 minute read) Fortnite has been removed from Apple’s App Store after Epic Games implemented its own in-app payment system that bypassed Apple’s standard 30 percent fee.
